verbose_text: Transgenic expression of the anti-apoptotic Bcl-2 protein has been shown to restore early B cell lymphopoiesis in some instances, yet the Bcl-2 transgene could not restore B cell development in Mb1 cre/wt Chd4 fl/fl mice (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Bcl-2 transgene could not restore B cell development in Mb1
